person.persName: Henry Clay Bowman (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Lawson Bowman in Morgan County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1852. Father of Woodson Bowman, Zerilda Bowman, Nicholas Bowman, and Caroline Bowman. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Owsley County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1863. Enrolled in the Three Forks Battalion (U.S.A.) as a private on December 3, 1864. Killed by Cas Ledford and John Jones in Breathitt County on April 3, 1865.
